resources.string: RedMart Multi Purpose Kitchen Towels are high-quality, responsibly sourced kitchen towels. They are strong and absorbent - ideal for cleaning, drying and removing grease. This paper is FSC certified to ensure a responsible and sustainable management of the worlds forests . This paper contains no optical brightening agents , that can cause skin irritation.
